entries.journal_entry_description: Help the Singing Mountain Clan by eliminating Nightsisters that are setting up for an attack.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Go to the Nightspider Spider Cult Cave at -1199, 6251
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Go to the Nightspider Cult Cave
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Kill 2 Spiderclan Webdancers to weaken their power.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Kill 3 Spiderclan Sentinels to open the way to their leaders.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Kill 3 Spiderclan Acolytes to shake their faith.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Kill at least 5 of the Spiderclan Sentries and reduce their guard force.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Kill 3 Spiderclan Stalkers and cripple their hunting ability.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Once you have killed the Spiderclan Sentries, Sentinels, Acolytes, and Webdancers, return to the Singing Mountain Clan Slave in the Dathomir Outpost.
entries.task07_journal_entry_title: Return to the Singing Mountain Clan Slave
